task_name: Implement Authorizer Lambda for JWT Validation
resource_notes: Security-critical component. Requires deep understanding of JWT validation and cryptographic principles.
alternative_approach: Use a managed authorizer if available, but custom logic is required for blocklist.
risk_factors: High risk of security vulnerability if implemented incorrectly (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security-focused peer review by SRE Lead. 95%+ unit test coverage.

task_name: Implement Default Message Handler with Socket.IO Wrapper
resource_notes: Core logic for all real-time messaging. Success depends on the PoC from TASK-GW-031.
alternative_approach: Pivot to AWS AppSync or a containerized service on Fargate if PoC fails.
risk_factors: Architectural complexity of running stateful Socket.IO on stateless Lambda (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: PoC must validate scalability and connection management before proceeding. Rigorous integration testing.

task_name: Automate Deployment to Staging Environment via CDK
resource_notes: Enables Continuous Delivery. Requires secure OIDC setup with AWS.
alternative_approach: Manual deployment via CLI, but this negates the automation benefits.
risk_factors: Misconfiguration of IAM roles could grant excessive permissions to GitHub Actions.
mitigation_strategy: Adhere to the principle of least privilege for the OIDC IAM role. Peer review by security lead.
